description: Entrepreneurs and startups with innovative ideas

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.description: Share a brief introduction about your innovation

questions.name: bio
questions.label: Executive Summary
questions.hint: Tell us briefly about your innovation (max 500 characters)

questions.name: innovation_area
questions.label: Innovation Area
questions.hint: Select the primary area of your innovation

questions.name: innovation_stage
questions.label: Innovation Stage
questions.hint: What stage is your innovation currently at?

questions.name: innovation_description
questions.label: Innovation Description
questions.hint: Briefly describe your innovation

questions.name: problem_statement
questions.label: Problem Statement
questions.hint: What problem does your innovation solve?

questions.name: solution_description
questions.label: Solution Description
questions.hint: How does your innovation solve this problem?

sections.title: Market & Competition
sections.description: Tell us about your market and competition

questions.name: target_market
questions.label: Target Market
questions.hint: Describe your target market and customer segments

questions.name: market_size
questions.label: Market Size
questions.hint: What is the estimated size of your target market?

questions.name: competitors
questions.label: Competitors
questions.hint: Who are your main competitors?

questions.name: competitive_advantage
questions.label: Competitive Advantage
questions.hint: What is your competitive advantage?

sections.title: Business Model
sections.description: Tell us about your business model

questions.name: revenue_model
questions.label: Revenue Model
questions.hint: How do you generate revenue?

questions.name: current_revenue
questions.label: Current Revenue
questions.hint: What is your current annual revenue?

questions.name: business_model_description
questions.label: Business Model Description
questions.hint: Describe your business model in detail

questions.name: team_size
questions.label: Team Size
questions.hint: How many people are on your team?

questions.name: team_expertise
questions.label: Team Expertise
questions.hint: What expertise does your team have?

questions.name: looking_for_team_members
questions.label: Looking for Team Members
questions.hint: Are you looking to expand your team?

questions.name: team_needs
questions.label: Team Needs
questions.hint: What expertise are you looking for?

sections.title: Funding
sections.description: Tell us about your funding status and needs

questions.name: funding_stage
questions.label: Funding Stage
questions.hint: What is your current funding stage?

questions.name: total_funding_raised
questions.label: Total Funding Raised
questions.hint: How much funding have you raised to date?

questions.name: seeking_funding
questions.label: Seeking Funding
questions.hint: Are you currently seeking funding?

questions.name: funding_amount_sought
questions.label: Funding Amount Sought
questions.hint: How much funding are you seeking?

questions.name: funding_use
questions.label: Use of Funds
questions.hint: How will you use the funding?

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.description: Tell us about your intellectual property

questions.name: has_ip
questions.label: Do you have intellectual property?
questions.hint: Patents, trademarks, copyrights, trade secrets, etc.

questions.name: ip_description
questions.label: IP Description
questions.hint: Describe your intellectual property

questions.name: ip_status
questions.label: IP Status
questions.hint: What is the status of your intellectual property?

sections.title: Social Media & Online Presence
sections.description: Share your online presence and social media profiles

questions.name: website
questions.label: Website
questions.hint: Your innovation or company website URL

questions.name: linkedin
questions.label: LinkedIn
questions.hint: Your LinkedIn profile or company page URL

questions.name: twitter
questions.label: Twitter/X
questions.hint: Your Twitter/X profile URL

questions.name: facebook
questions.label: Facebook
questions.hint: Your Facebook profile or page URL

questions.name: instagram
questions.label: Instagram
questions.hint: Your Instagram profile URL

questions.name: contact_email
questions.label: Business Email
questions.hint: Your business email for contacts

questions.name: contact_phone
questions.label: Business Phone
questions.hint: Your business phone number with country code

questions.name: whatsapp
questions.label: Business WhatsApp
questions.hint: Your business WhatsApp number

questions.name: preferred_contact_method
questions.label: Preferred Business Contact Method
questions.hint: How would you prefer to be contacted for business matters?

questions.name: city
questions.label: City
questions.hint: City where you are located

questions.name: country
questions.label: Country
questions.hint: Country where you are located

questions.name: willing_to_relocate
questions.label: Operate in Other Markets
questions.hint: Are you willing to operate in markets outside your current location?

questions.name: preferred_locations
questions.label: Other Markets of Interest
questions.hint: If willing to operate in other markets, which other markets would you be interested in

sections.title: Goals & Interests
sections.description: Share your goals and interests for better matchmaking

questions.name: short_term_goals
questions.label: Short-term Goals
questions.hint: What are your short-term goals (next 12 months)?

questions.name: long_term_goals
questions.label: Long-term Goals
questions.hint: What are your long-term goals (beyond 12 months)?

questions.name: challenges
questions.label: Current Challenges
questions.hint: What are your biggest challenges right now?

questions.name: support_needed
questions.label: Support Needed
questions.hint: What kind of support do you need most?
